Entries.passedOut1_Billed_Male: Dear {{Random: {{Title}} }} @,^Last night, a Joja team member found you incapacitated. A medical team was dispatched to bring you home safely.^We're glad you're okay!^^(You've been billed {0}g for this service)^^-Morris^Joja Customer Satisfaction Representative[#]Joja Invoice
